articles.name: Nacho Cheese Crumbed Chicken Tenders
articles.description: Fried rice is one of those dishes you can whip up after a busy day when you don’t know what else to make. Everyone loves it. It is eaten throughout Asia, and this is our play on it, bringing in the much-loved kimchi flavours. It’s a great way to use up leftover cooked rice, and feel free to add any extra vegetables you may have in your fridge.
